channel.title: Crypto News - SosoValue Research
channel.description: Latest crypto news from SosoValue Research

item.title: Ethereum spot ETFs saw a net inflow of $2.18B last week, setting a new weekly net inflow record.According to SoSoValue data, last week's trading days (Eastern Time, July 14 to July 18), Ethereum spot ETFs saw a net inflow of $2.18B last week, setting a new record for single-week net inflows. The Ethereum spot ETF with the largest net inflow last week was Blackrock's ETF ETHA, with a weekly net inflow of $1.76B. Currently, ETHA's total historical net inflow has reached $8.06B. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: OpenAI Founder: Over 1 Million GPUs to be Deployed Before Year-EndOpenAI founder Sam Altman tweeted, "We will deploy over 1 million GPUs by the end of this year. I am very proud of the team, but now they better figure out how to increase that number by 100x." [Foresight News]

item.title: UK working to sell $7B in seized Bitcoin to boost budget: ReportA new report suggests the UK Treasury is working to sell up to $7 billion worth of seized Bitcoin, but one person has slammed the report as “sensationalism” amid a crypto bull run.

item.title: BitMart officially launches its Chinese name "币市" (Bì Shì), accelerating its global localization strategy.BitMart has announced the official launch of its new Chinese brand name, "币市" (Bì Shì), and has simultaneously introduced a new brand mascot. Since its establishment in 2017, BitMart has provided services to over ten million users in nearly 200 countries and regions worldwide. The platform now offers over 1,700 spot trading pairs and more than 400 perpetual contracts. In conjunction with the brand upgrade, 币市 (BitMart) will soon launch a series of activities and exclusive services for Chinese users, and will continue to increase investment in the Asia-Pacific region. [Odaily News]

item.title: A new wallet withdrew 400 BTC from Binance, worth $47.22 million
item.description: On July 21, according to Onchain Lens monitoring, another newly created wallet withdrew 400 BTC worth $47.22 million from Binance 9 hours ago. In the past 4 days, a total of 4 newly created wallets withdrew 1,800 BTC worth $212.40 million

item.title: Binance to Remove Seed Tags From BONK, EIGEN, ETHFI, PENGU, and PEPE on July 21
item.description: Binance has announced that it will remove the seed tags from Bonk (BONK), EigenLayer (EIGEN), ether fi (ETHFI), Pudgy Penguins (PENGU), and Pepe (PEPE) on July 21, 2025. Seed tags are typically used to identify newer tokens or projects

item.title: Hong Kong stocks of stablecoin concept stocks are strengthening, with China Inspection & Certification Healthcare rising more than 30%.Hong Kong stock stablecoin concept stocks collectively strengthened, with China Inspection Medical surging over 30%, Linklogis Technology rising over 8%, Victory Securities up 7.1%, OSL Group up 1.43%, Bright Smart Securities up 5.60%, and Alibaba also rising. Regarding news, U.S. President Trump recently formally signed the "Guidance and Establishment of National Innovation Act for Stablecoins in the United States" (GENIUS Act) at the White House, marking the entry of U.S. stablecoin regulatory legislation into the implementation phase. In addition, Hong Kong's "Stablecoin Ordinance" was officially published in the Gazette on May 30 and will take effect on August 1. From an ecological chain perspective, the stablecoin ecosystem can be specifically divided into three levels: primary market issuance, secondary market circulation, and application scenarios. In terms of individual stocks, China Inspection Medical has initiated the application for a U.S. stablecoin license and is actively promoting the Web3 exchange ecosystem; Yunfeng Financial recently announced on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange that it will strategically focus on areas such as Web 3, Real World Assets (RWA), digital currencies, ESG zero-carbon assets, and artificial intelligence. [Sina Finance] [Odaily News]
